posts.post_text: May 27, 2019 at 8:52 PM#3The problem here is that fixtures don't have the same dmx layout/naming used in librariesYou can put attributes at specific values: Attribute "Gobo1" at value"gobo 1.1" is just a name in the MA Library which can be changed by the user so therefore not a usefull reference for calling in macrosWhat you could do is let a macro create a certain amount of presets, reference those presets into your programming and when done update those presets with the correct values
